pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# OlliePy - An alternative approach for data science> **OlliePy** is a python package which can help data scientists in> exploring their data and evaluating and analysing their machine learning experiments by> utilising the power and structure of modern web applications. > The data scientist only needs to provide the data and any required > information and OlliePy will generate the rest.##
DocumentationGet started by following the [guide](https://ahmed-mohamed-sn.github.io/olliePy/)### Installation`pip install -U olliepy`
